question: Which among the following volcanoes is not located in Indonesia?
explanation: Mt. Mayon is an active strato-volcano on the island of Luzon in Philippines. A popular tourist spot, it is renowned for its "perfect cone" because of its symmetric conical shape. It is the most active volcano in the Philippines. It was reclassified as a National Park in 2000 and renamed as Mayon Volcano National Park.
